quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.issuer_name: Soho Holly Futures Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.nm: Soho Holly Futures Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.summary: Soho Holly Futures Co Ltd, formerly Holly Futures Co Ltd, is a China-based company mainly engaged in commodity trading and risk management business. The Company operates two segments. The Futures Brokerage and Asset Management Business segment mainly engages in the transactions of commodity futures and financial futures, as well as the development and sales of asset management products and services. The segment also engages in investment activities in asset management plans, bank wealth management products, listed and unlisted securities, trust schemes, funds, and derivative financial instruments. The Commodity Trading and Risk Management Business segment mainly provides bulk commodity purchase and resale, futures arbitrage, futures cash basis trading, and hedging services.
